henry.name: Henry Damian
henry.ab1: When Henry is below 50% HP , damage increase
henry.description: Famous for his swordsman skill,Henry travel across the world to find someone who can challenge him for an epic match.

roland.name: Roland zain
roland.ab1: Gain 2 shield to use in battle
roland.description: Roland is leader of his clan and he will do whatever it takes to protect his people, dont judge a book by its cover , roland is actually kind hearted man on the inside who loves magical creatures.

jessie.name: Jessie
jessie.description: When she was 8 , Jessie discovered that she has healing ability, ever since then she try to pratice her magic in order to be the best healer in the world.

ghatokaca.name: Ghatokaca
ghatokaca.ab1: First attack have additional bonus of 15 DMG (base damage)
ghatokaca.ab2: All Tanks in team received extra ultimate move and speed increase by 35
ghatokaca.description: Some say he have the strength of 10 man himself, Ghatokaca trained himself physically and spiritually at a lone island.

kayla.name: Kayla
kayla.ab1: When kayla uses ultimate attack , it triple instead of double.
kayla.ab2: All Mage DMG +5, All Human HP+15
kayla.description: Sister of Mayla, Kayla can perform highly dangerous spell,you dont want to make her angry.

mayla.name: Mayla
mayla.ab2: If team consist of 3 different classes , All team HP+15 , damage + 3
mayla.description: Sister of Kayla , unlike her sister ,she has no interest in magic, but totally interested in archery.

leoxi.name: Leoxi
leoxi.ab1: Have 25% chance to dodge opponent attack
leoxi.description: Leoxi is the master of dodging , his incredible dodging skill allow him to get close to enemy without being harmed

djino.name: Djino
djino.description: Rumoured to be the fastest assassin , with a shadow to cover his movement,Djino appears anywhere and strike opponent from their back.

ophikira.name: Ophikira
ophikira.ab1: Gain blood steal move which deals damage and heals ophikira
ophikira.description: Warrioress from the Lizard clan , specially trained for assassination job, she have no mercy when it comes her preys.

gladranox.name: Gladranox
gladranox.description: Royal Guardian of palace , always charge in the frontline leading army of his own.

triton.name: Triton
triton.ab1: Revive once after death in battle , but damage is reduced to half after revival
triton.description: Once a human , triton was betrayed by his people, killed and thrown into the ocean , saved by the curse of the sea , he was given chance to reborned as demon to bring nightmare to those who pass the cursed sea

vereena.name: Vereena
vereena.ab1: Her attack can pierce through opponent shield
vereena.ab2: All team mate gets 1.3x damage boost for their first attack
vereena.description: She who uses powerful magic and her bow to protect her kingdom. She is a fierce Assassin and does not shy away from a challenge. Her arrow infused with magic are able to pierce through any physical object.

hanzo.name: Hanzo
hanzo.ab1:
Choose from 1 of the shadow beast to summon: 
✦ Wolf : Hanzo HP+30 , speed + 30 , DMG+5
✦ Hawk : Hanzo ultimate move + 2 , shield + 1
hanzo.description: His origins are shrouded in mystery. Some say he was born in the shadows, others that he was a mortal who became obsessed with the darkness.

thadues.name: Thadues
thadues.ab2: [Passive] Every teammate heal 2 HP every round
thadues.description: Thadeus is a quiet and studious wizard, known for his encyclopedic knowledge of spells and enchantments. He is often look for new spells to learn or ways to improve.

kragthar.name: Kragthar
kragthar.ab1: Each time Kragthar attack , deduct 8 HP from teammate which are still alive (unable to deduct if teammate HP lower than 8), add 4 dmg to himself for every teammate HP is deducted from.
kragthar.description: Kragthar is a ruthless and savage creature, known for his mastery of deadly magic and his insatiable thirst for power, he is cunning and manipulative, always seeking to bend others to his will.

gon.name: Gon Freecss
gon.description: Rookie Hunter and the son of Ging Freecss. Finding his father is Gon's motivation in becoming a Hunter.

adult gon.name: Gon Freecss
adult gon.description: Rookie Hunter and the son of Ging Freecss. Finding his father is Gon's motivation in becoming a Hunter.

killua.name: Killua Zoldyck
killua.description: Third child of Silva and Kikyo Zoldyck and the heir of the Zoldyck Family , he runs away from home and becomes a Rookie Hunter and the best friend of Gon Freecss

godspeed killua.name: Killua Zoldyck
godspeed killua.description: Third child of Silva and Kikyo Zoldyck and the heir of the Zoldyck Family , he runs away from home and becomes a Rookie Hunter and the best friend of Gon Freecss

kurapika.name: Kurapika
kurapika.description: Last survivor of the Kurta Clan. He is a Blacklist Hunter and current leader of the organization founded by Light Nostrade , goal is to avenge his clan and recover the remaining Scarlet Eyes.

leorio.name: Leorio Paradiknight
leorio.description: Rookie Hunter and a member of the Zodiacs with the codename "Boar". He is currently a medical student, studying to become a doctor.

hisoka.name: Hisoka Morow
hisoka.description: Hunter and former member #4 of the Phantom Troupe , He is always in search for strong opponents, and would spare those who have great potential

biscuit.name: Biscuit Krueger
biscuit.description: Double-Star Stone Hunter who was hired by Battera to clear the video game Greed Island following the auction for the game in Yorknew City.

isaac.name: Isaac Netero
isaac.description: Chairman of the Hunter Association and the Head of the Exam Commission. In his youth, he was extolled as the most powerful Nen user in the world, and retained dreadful strength even in his old age.

ken.name: Ken Kaneki
ken.ab1:
Transform :
✦ HP+10
Kagune increase Kaneki damage by 4 , if Touka Kirishima in team , Kaneki damage increase by 6 instead
ken.description: Student at Kamii University and was living a normal life, everything changed after he had Ghoul organ transplanted into him and became a One-Eyed Ghoul.

ken's kagune form.name: Ken Kaneki (Kagune Form)
ken's kagune form.ab1:
Transform :
✦ HP+10
Kagune increase Kaneki damage by 4 , if Touka Kirishima in team , Kaneki damage increase by 6 instead
ken's kagune form.description: Student at Kamii University and was living a normal life, everything changed after he had Ghoul organ transplanted into him and became a One-Eyed Ghoul.

touka.name: Touka Kirishima
touka.ab2: For every human in team , their HP deducted by 10% , 3x of the deducted HP will be added to Touka Kirishima
touka.description: She is seen as a normal girl attending school with normal friends and being a café waitress. As a ghoul, she reveals a more reckless and ruthless personality

gourmet.name: Gourmet
gourmet.description: Infamous ghoul who was a member of the Ghoul Restaurant until he betrayed the organization. Obsessed with Ken Kaneki and wants to devour his flesh and taste his blood

juuzou.name: Juuzou Suzuya
juuzou.ab2: Every teammate damage increase by the amount of shield they have
juuzou.description: Juuzou Suzuya is a Special Class Ghoul Investigator. In the past, he went by the name Rei Suzuya.

nishiki.name: Nishiki Nishio
nishiki.description: Nishiki is a ghoul who hunts his own kind. Nishiki is considered to be an S-rank ghoul and has earned the nickname [Serpent] due to the snake mask that he wears.

renji.name: Renji yomo
renji.description: He has an immovable stone-like glare. He is normally in a long trenchcoat common with ghouls and wears a black shirt he has kept since his days in the 4th ward.

uta.name: Uta
uta.description: Uta is a ghoul and an old friend of Renji Yomo and Itori. He owns the HySy ArtMask Studio, where he sells masks, whilst also being a member of the Clowns.

hinami.name: Hinami Fueguchi
hinami.ab3: Hinami Fueguchi HP follow the highest HP teammate
hinami.description: Hinami is a shy and childish girl with a very gentle heart. She is also eager for knowledge and fond of reading in order to learn.

hideyoshi.name: Hideyoshi Nagachika
hideyoshi.ab3: If Ken Kaneki in team , Ken Kaneki HP+25
hideyoshi.description: Hide has a carefree attitude, almost always friendly and joyful. He is Kaneki only friend and does not seem to share relationships with other people, despite his appearance.

kureo.name: Kureo Mado
kureo.description: First Class Ghoul Investigator and Koutarou Amon former partner and mentor.

amon.name: Amon Kotaro
amon.description: He is a former A first class police investigator who investigates Ghouls, also known as a Dove. He comes to the 20th ward with his mentor, Mado Kureo, to investigate Ghoul incidents in the area.

kuzen.name: Kuzen Yoshimura
kuzen.description: Owner of Anteiku café. A kind and generous old man, the manager shows that he is both wise and reasonable even among the ghouls.

rize.name: Rize Kamishiro
rize.description: She was known under her nickname Binge Eater , Due to her eating habits, Rize was a threat to most ghouls in various wards

kirito.name: Kirito
kirito.ab1: StarBurst Stream deal 3 time the base damage
kirito.ab3: If Asuna in same team with Kirito , Kirito HP +15
kirito.description: Protagonist of Sword Art Online. He is a master swordsman and a skilled player

asuna.name: Asuna
asuna.ab2: All Fighter in team damage increase by 8
asuna.description: Kirito's love interest and highly skilled swordsman.

leafa.name: Leafa
leafa.ab1: Healing Magic : Increase HP of teammate that are still alive by +20HP
leafa.description: Cousin of Kirito in real life , and a member of the Sylph guild

yui.name: Yui
yui.ab2: All teammate receive extra shield and ultimate move while Yui have 0 ultimate and 0 shield.
yui.description: Kirito's and Asuna's virtual daughter, an AI

heathcliff.name: HeathCliff
heathcliff.description: The leader of the Knights of the Blood guild and the former main antagonist of Sword Art Online.

klein.name: Klein
klein.description: Friend of kirito, joins him on his adventures in Sword Art Online.

sinon.name: Sinon
sinon.description: She is an adept sniper and anti-villain player character of Gun Gale Online in the Sword Art Online series.

eugeo.name: Eugeo
eugeo.description: One of Kirito friend and a main protagonist in the Sword Art Online Alicization arc

alice.name: Alice Zuberg
alice.description: Daughter of the leader of the Integrity Knight Order and the main heroine of Alicization.

tanjiro.name: Tanjiro Kamado
tanjiro.ab1: Deal 2x damage if opponent is demon race
tanjiro.ab3: If Nezuko in the same team as Tanjiro and she is the only demon in team , Tanjiro HP+20 , DMG+3
tanjiro.description: The protagonist of the series, Tanjiro is a kind and compassionate young man who seeks to avenge his family and help his sister Nezuko, who has been transformed into a Demon herself.

nezuko.name: Nezuko Kamado
nezuko.ab1:
✦ Blood Demon Art : Exploding Blood , All human teammate HP healed by 15 , All demon opponent HP deducted by 15 (lowest opponent HP left = 1)
✦ Transform: Fully recover HP , DMG+3
nezuko.description: Nezuko is Tanjiro's younger sister, and her transformation into a Demon drives him to fight on her behalf and help her regain her humanity.

Nezuko Transfomed.name: Nezuko Kamado [Transformed]
Nezuko Transfomed.ab1:
✦ Blood Demon Art : Exploding Blood , All human teammate HP healed by 15 , All demon opponent HP deducted by 15 (lowest opponent HP left = 1)
✦ Transform: Fully recover HP , DMG+3
Nezuko Transfomed.description: Nezuko is Tanjiro's younger sister, and her transformation into a Demon drives him to fight on her behalf and help her regain her humanity.

Nezuko's Blood demon art.name: Nezuko Kamado [Blood demon art]
Nezuko's Blood demon art.ab1:
✦ Blood Demon Art : Exploding Blood , All human teammate HP healed by 15 , All demon opponent HP deducted by 15 (lowest opponent HP left = 1)
✦ Transform: Fully recover HP , DMG+3
Nezuko's Blood demon art.description: Nezuko is Tanjiro's younger sister, and her transformation into a Demon drives him to fight on her behalf and help her regain her humanity.

zenitsu.name: Zenitsu Agatsuma
zenitsu.ab1:
Trigger :Sleep Mode : Zenitsu fainted and enter sleep mode when Zenitsu get attacked
Entering sleep mode : HP+6 , DMG+6 , speed +6
zenitsu.description: He is a cowardly but loyal and brave warrior who is devoted to Tanjiro and Nezuko.

zenitsu's sleep stance.name: Zenitsu Agatsuma
zenitsu's sleep stance.ab1:
Trigger :Sleep Mode : Zenitsu fainted and enter sleep mode when Zenitsu get attacked
Entering sleep mode : HP+6 , DMG+6 , speed +6
zenitsu's sleep stance.description: He is a cowardly but loyal and brave warrior who is devoted to Tanjiro and Nezuko.

hashibira.name: Hashibira Inosuke
hashibira.ab2:
✦Beast teammate HP +15 , DMG + 4 , speed + 50
✦Human teammate HP+10 , Damage +3 , speed + 20
hashibira.description: A wild and rebellious swordsman, Inosuke is a hot-headed and headstrong fighter who will rush into danger without any fear or hesitation.

kanao.name: Kanao Tsuyuri
kanao.description: A young woman with a mysterious past, Kanao is a clever and skilled fighter.

giyu.name: Giyu Tomioka
giyu.ab1: Block the first attack by opponent and Gain extra ultimate move
giyu.description: A cool-headed and serious swordsman, Giyu is the water hashira and a skilled and talented swordsman.

kyojuro.name: Kyojuro Rengoku
kyojuro.ab2: If Rengoku is the leader and there are no other member in the team , Rengoku HP x1.5 , Damage x2
kyojuro.description: Kyojuro is a powerful fire-breathing swordsman who is devoted to protecting his allies and completing his mission.

tengen.name: Tengen Uzui
tengen.ab1:
✦Immune to poison
✦Gain extra ultimate move
✦Team swap chance +1
tengen.description: A laid-back and humorous person, Tengen is a Sound Hashira and a skilled swordsman

shinobu.name: Shinobu Kocho
shinobu.ab1: Poison Stab will cause opponent to be poisoned for 3 rounds , dealing 20 Damage each round.
shinobu.description: A quiet and petite woman, Shinobu is insect hashira and skillful for using her poison

yushiro.name: Yushiro Yamamoto
yushiro.ab1: Blood Demon Art : Blindfold: , Reveal opponent team stats
yushiro.description: Supporting character of the anime ,  He is the traveling companion of Tamayo and a close ally of Tanjiro Kamado.

tamayo.name: Tamayo
tamayo.ab1: Blood Demon Art : Blood Bewitchment , Opponent first attack will damage themselves. (lowest opponent HP left = 1)
tamayo.description: Tamayo is a gentle, wise, and intelligent person , Having devoted most of her life to researching the science behind Demons and Demon Transformation

saitama.name: Saitama
saitama.ab1:
✦ Break through opponent shield.
✦ Immune to burn , poison , freeze , stun
saitama.description: Saitama is currently the most powerful being to exist in the series. Saitama faces a self-imposed existential crisis, as he is now too powerful to gain any thrill from battle.

genos.name: Genos
genos.ab1:
✦ Ultimate move will burn opponent for 1 round with damage equivalent to 2x of Genos level.
✦After Genos was defeated , if opponent is human race : self destruct and reduce opponent current HP by 80%
genos.description: Genos is a mechanical cyborg , He is always aiming to become more powerful.

tatsumaki.name: Tatsumaki
tatsumaki.ab1: Tatsumaki Ultimate move will deal damage equivalent to 1.5x of her level to opponent who are not in battlefield (lowest opponent HP left = 1)
tatsumaki.description: As the second-ranked S-Class hero, Tatsumaki is extremely powerful. She is one of the most powerful heroes overall and is the most powerful esper.

tatsumaki ultimate.name: Tatsumaki Ultimate
tatsumaki ultimate.ab1: Tatsumaki Ultimate move will deal damage equivalent to 1.5x of her level to opponent who are not in battlefield (lowest opponent HP left = 1)
tatsumaki ultimate.description: As the second-ranked S-Class hero, Tatsumaki is extremely powerful. She is one of the most powerful heroes overall and is the most powerful esper.

fubuki.name: Fubuki
fubuki.ab3: If Fubuki in same team as Tatsumaki , both Fubuki and Tatsumaki HP+15
fubuki.description: Fubuki is an esper, the younger sister of Tatsumaki, and the leader of the Blizzard Group , a B-Class hero faction.

king.name: King
king.ab1: Immune to ultimate move from opponent
king.ab3: If Saitama in team , King damage follow Saitama damage , otherwise King damage = 1
king.description: King is just a normal average person, who unintentionally gained credit for things he did not do and became the  S-Class Rank 7 professional hero.

king's engine.name: King's Engine
king's engine.ab1: Immune to ultimate move from opponent
king's engine.ab3: If Saitama in team , King damage follow Saitama damage , otherwise King damage = 1
king's engine.description: King is just a normal average person, who unintentionally gained credit for things he did not do and became the  S-Class Rank 7 professional hero.

speed-o-sound.name: Speed-o-Sound Sonic
speed-o-sound.description: Speed-o-Sound Sonic is a master of ninjutsu who can move at the speed of sound

mumen.name: Mumen rider
mumen.description: Mumen Rider  has no superpowers nor any real fighting ability, but more than makes up for that with courage and willingness to face off against any threat no matter how great or small.

garou.name: Garou
garou.ab1:
✦ Immune to poison
✦ When Garou in 2nd team slot : Ultimate move+1
✦ When Garou in 3rd team slot : shield+2
garou.description: Garou is a disciple of Silver Fang , Because of his fascination with monsters, he is commonly called the Human Monster.

Transformed Garou.name: Transformed Garou
Transformed Garou.ab1:
✦ Immune to poison
✦ When Garou in 2nd team slot : Ultimate move+1
✦ When Garou in 3rd team slot : shield+2
Transformed Garou.description: Garou is a disciple of Silver Fang , Because of his fascination with monsters, he is commonly called the Human Monster.

silver.name: Silver Fang
silver.description: Silver Fang, is the major supporting character of One-Punch Man. He is a martial artist, and Master of the Flowing Water Fist Fighting Style

metal.name: Metal Bat
metal.ab1: The lower the HP of Metal Bat , the higher the next damage dealt (cap at 2x damage)
metal.description: As an S-Class hero, Metal Bat is very powerful. Despite his lower rank, he is a powerful and intimidating combatant.

atomic.name: Atomic Samurai
atomic.description: Atomic Samurai is the S-Class Rank 4 professional hero of the Hero Association and is recognized as one of its most powerful heroes. He is a swordmaster and a member of the Council of Swordsmiths

puri.name: Puri Puri Prisoner
puri.description: Puri Puri Prisoner is the S-Class Rank 17 professional hero of the Hero Asso. He is the boss of the prisoners held in smelly Lid prison.

yuji.name: Yuji Itadori
yuji.ab1:
✦ Gain 1 🌀 curse energy every round
✦ Each curse energy increase damage by 10% (curse energy halved when ultimate move is used)
yuji.description: Yuji is a first-year Jujutsu Sorcerer at Tokyo Jujutsu High who is thrown into the world of sorcery after he ate a Cursed Object.

gojo.name: Gojo Satoru
gojo.ab1:
✦ Gojo Satoru deal 1.5x damage to Demon and Spirit race
✦Domain Expansion (5🌀): Stun opponent [Human , Beast , Spirit , Demon] for 2 round
gojo.description: Gojo is a special grade sorcerer and widely recognized as the strongest in the world.

Gojo's Domain Expansion.name: Gojo Satoru DOMAIN EXPANSION
Gojo's Domain Expansion.ab1:
✦ Gojo Satoru deal 1.5x damage to Demon and Spirit race
✦Domain Expansion (5🌀): Stun opponent [Human , Beast , Spirit , Demon] for 2 round
Gojo's Domain Expansion.description: Gojo is a special grade sorcerer and widely recognized as the strongest in the world.

megumi.name: Megumi Fushiguro
megumi.ab1:
✧ Gain 1 🌀 curse energy every round
✧ Summon shadow technique by spending curse energy :
✦ Nue (4🌀) : deal 15 damage to opponent whole team (lowest opponent HP left = 1)
✦ Demon Dog (3🌀) : HP+20 , damage + 5 , speed + 10
megumi.description: Fushiguro is a grade 2 jujutsu sorcerer and first-year student at Tokyo Jujutsu High alongside Yuji Itadori and Nobara Kugisaki.

nanami.name: Nanami Kento
nanami.ab1: If opponent HP is between 70-79% , Nanami Kento deal 2.7x damage to it.
nanami.description: Nanami is ranked grade 1 and operate primarily out of the Tokyo campus.

nobara.name: Nobara Kugisaki
nobara.ab1:
✦ Gain 1 🌀 curse energy every round
✦ Mark opponent using Infused Nail (4🌀), marked opponent will received double damage for the rest of the battle.
nobara.description: Nobara is a first-year student and grade 3 jujutsu sorcerer at Tokyo Jujutsu High studying under Satoru Gojo.

aoi.name: Aoi Todo
aoi.ab1:
✦ Gain 1 🌀 curse energy every round
✦ If curse energy 🌀 more than 3, stun opponent for 1 round when swapped.
aoi.ab3: If Aoi Todo and Yuji Itadori in same team , Aoi Todo and Yuji Itadori ultimate move+1
aoi.description: Todo is a grade 1 jujutsu sorcerer and considers Yuji Itadori his best friend.

mechamaru.name: Mechamaru
mechamaru.ab1:
✦ Gain 1 🌀 curse energy every round
✦ Each curse energy increase chance to hit critical damage (2x damage) by 10% (curse energy halved after critical hit)
mechamaru.description: Mechamaru is a second-year at Kyoto Jujutsu High used by Kokichi Muta as his proxy to attend school.

toge.name: Toge Inumaki
toge.ab1:
✦ Gain 1 🌀 curse energy every round
✦ Cursed speech (4🌀) : if opponent is [Human , demon , beast , spirit] race , opponent damage reduce by 40% for the rest of the battle
toge.description: Toge is the descendant of the Inumaki family born with a powerful cursed technique: Cursed Speech

panda.name: Panda
panda.ab1:
✦ Gain 1 🌀 curse energy every round
✦ Transform (3🌀) : Gorilla Type : HP+40 , Damage + [value of curse energy]
panda.description: A small spirit creature that attaches itself to people and can manipulate their luck and fortune by producing good or bad luck.

panda gorilla form.name: Panda Gorilla Form
panda gorilla form.ab1:
✦ Gain 1 🌀 curse energy every round
✦ Transform (3🌀) : Gorilla Type : HP+40 , Damage + [value of curse energy]
panda gorilla form.description: A small spirit creature that attaches itself to people and can manipulate their luck and fortune by producing good or bad luck.

momo.name: Momo Nishimiya
momo.ab1:
✦ Gain 1 🌀 curse energy every round
✦ Each curse energy increase chance to dodge by 10% (curse energy halved after dodge)
momo.description: Momo is a third-year student at Kyoto Jujutsu High and a semi-grade 2 jujutsu sorcerer.

maki.name: Maki Zenin
maki.description: Maki Zenin is currently a second-year at Tokyo Jujutsu High. She is the elder twin sister of Mai Zenin.

mai.name: Mai Zenin
mai.ab1: Deal 2.5x damage to opponent , but have 50% chance of miss
mai.description: Mai was born in the Zenin family, as the younger twin sister of Maki. Later in life when Maki left the clan, Mai began to resent Maki for leaving her.

kasumi.name: Kasumi Miwa
kasumi.description: Kasumi is a second-year at Kyoto Jujutsu High.

ryomen.name: Ryomen Sukuna
ryomen.ab1:
✦ Gain 1 🌀 curse energy every round
✦ Domain Expansion (3🌀): Ryomen Sukuna damage increase 1.5x for the rest of the battle.
ryomen.ab2: Demon and Spirit race teammate HP+10, Damage+5
ryomen.description: A powerful curse said to be the most evil of them all. He is an ancient entity that seeks unlimited power and destruction.

Sukuna's Domain Expansion.name: Ryomen Sukuna DOMAIN EXPANSION
Sukuna's Domain Expansion.ab1:
✦ Gain 1 🌀 curse energy every round
✦ Domain Expansion (3🌀): Ryomen Sukuna damage increase 1.5x for the rest of the battle.
Sukuna's Domain Expansion.ab2: Demon and Spirit race teammate HP+10, Damage+5
Sukuna's Domain Expansion.description: A powerful curse said to be the most evil of them all. He is an ancient entity that seeks unlimited power and destruction.

noritoshi.name: Noritoshi Kamo
noritoshi.ab1:
✦ Gain 1 🌀 curse energy every round
✦ Flowing red scales (3🌀) : Gain extra ultimate move , HP+10
✦ Piercing blood move can break through opponent shield
noritoshi.description: Noritoshi Kamo is a young Jujutsu sorcerer in his final year at the Kyoto Metropolitan Curse Technical College

Flowing red Scales stance.name: Noritoshi Kamo
Flowing red Scales stance.ab1:
✦ Gain 1 🌀 curse energy every round
✦ Flowing red scales (3🌀) : Gain extra ultimate move , HP+10
✦ Piercing blood move can break through opponent shield
Flowing red Scales stance.description: Noritoshi Kamo is a young Jujutsu sorcerer in his final year at the Kyoto Metropolitan Curse Technical College

mereum.name: Mereum
mereum.ab3:
If mereum in team and no HxH available in team 
✦ Mereum HP+9
✦ Mereum Ultimate+1
mereum.description: Mereum was the most powerful offspring of the Chimera Ant Queen.

santa.name: Santa Claus
santa.ab2: Santa gift 1 ultimate and 1 shield to every teammate but himself have 0 shield and 0 ultimate

kishou.name: Kishou Arima
kishou.ab3: If Kishou Arima is the only 〖Tokyo Ghoul〗 series in team , Kishou Arima damage increase by 4 , speed increase by 50
kishou.description: Arima is a Special Class Ghoul Investigator in CCG, an organization that specializes in hunting and studying Ghoul.

death.name: Death Gun
death.ab1: Mark opponent using Marking move while dealing damage , marked opponent will received double damage for the rest of the battle.
death.description: A mysterious killer in Sword Art Online who is out to assassinate the strongest players in the game.

quinella.name: Quinella
quinella.ab1: Quinella heals HP equivalent to damage she deals.
quinella.description: The main antagonist of Alicization and ruler of Underworld.

akaza.name: Akaza
akaza.ab1: Blood Demon Art :Technique Deployment : Convert 5% speed into DMG
akaza.description: Akaza is a stubborn demon who respects the strong and despises the weak. So much so, that the demon goes out of his way to challenge powerful fighters and demon slayers.

Akaza Blood Demon Art.name: Akaza Blood Demon Art
Akaza Blood Demon Art.ab1: Blood Demon Art :Technique Deployment : Convert 5% speed into DMG
Akaza Blood Demon Art.description: Akaza is a stubborn demon who respects the strong and despises the weak. So much so, that the demon goes out of his way to challenge powerful fighters and demon slayers.

daki.name: Daki
daki.ab1: Summon Gyutaro after Daki HP drop below 50% , DMG increase by 3 , Fully recover HP
daki.description: Daki was a very prideful, dismissive, and sadistic person, taking enjoyment in toying with her victims before killing them and not showing the slightest bit of guilt or remorse for taking the lives of her victims

Daki & Gyutaro.name: Daki & Gyutaro
Daki & Gyutaro.ab1: Summon Gyutaro after Daki HP drop below 50% , DMG increase by 3 , Fully recover HP
Daki & Gyutaro.description: Daki was a very prideful, dismissive, and sadistic person, taking enjoyment in toying with her victims before killing them and not showing the slightest bit of guilt or remorse for taking the lives of her victims

boros.name: Boros
boros.ab1:
✦ Tranform Boros[2] : HP increase by 40 , speed increase by 40

mahito.name: Mahito
mahito.ab1:
✦ Gain 1 🌀 curse energy every round 
✦ Domain Expansion  (5🌀): Remove all ultimate move from opponent teamates.
mahito.description: Mahito is a sadistic, immature cursed spirit who enjoys toying with human emotions.
